https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8qoQgfuWnEKFueOwiPA9zUblsow.jpg CERN in Switzerland is a research center where they try to recreate the big bang. Nikolaus Geyrhalter follows the center's infrastructure and meets the people who created the "Large Hadron Collider". CERN
